description: Connector facilitates automated operations to Analyze and detect the Threats, Violations and Risk associated with users in organisation.
name: securonix-snypr
label: Securonix SNYPR

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Securonix SNYPR server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Username to access the Securonix SNYPR server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: password to access the Securonix SNYPR server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Tenant
fields.name: tenant
fields.description: Tenant ID that has been configured for your account to access the Securonix SNYP Rserver.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Add Comment
operations.description: Adds a comment on a Securonix SNYPR incident based on the incident ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incidentId
parameters.tooltip: ID of the incident in Securonix SNYPR to which you want to add comment.
parameters.description: ID of the incident in Securonix SNYPR to which you want to add comment.

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.name: comment
parameters.tooltip: Comment that you want to add to the specified incident.
parameters.description: Comment that you want to add to the specified incident.

operations.title: Create Incident
operations.description: Creates a new incident in the Securonix SNYPR platform based on the policy name, entity type, and other input parameters you have specified. Note: If the case is already created and is present in the Securonix SNYPR platform, then return the details of the existing incident.

parameters.title: Policy Name
parameters.name: violationName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the policy that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: Name of the policy that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Data Source Name
parameters.name: datasourceName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the data source that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: Name of the data source that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.name: entityName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the account that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: Name of the account that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Entity Type
parameters.name: entityType
parameters.tooltip: Type of entity that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: Type of entity that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Action Name
parameters.name: actionName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the action available in threat management that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: Name of the action available in threat management that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR. You can choose from the following options: Mark as Concern and create incident, Non-Concern, or Mark in progress (still investigating).
options: Mark as concern and create incident
parameters.value: Mark as concern and create incident

parameters.title: Resource Name
parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the resource that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR. Note: This parameter required for Activity account.
parameters.description: Name of the resource that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR. Note: This parameter required for Activity account.

parameters.title: Employee ID
parameters.name: employeeid
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) ID of the employee that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: (Optional) ID of the employee that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Workflow Name
parameters.name: workflow
parameters.tooltip: Name of the workflow that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR. Note: This field required when you specify the action name as Mark as concern and create incident.
parameters.description: Name of the workflow that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR. Note: This field required when you specify the action name as Mark as concern and create incident.

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.name: comment
parameters.tooltip: Comment that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: Comment that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Criticality
parameters.name: criticality
parameters.tooltip: Criticality that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: Criticality that you want to associate with the new incident that you want to create in Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Check Task on Incident
operations.description: Checks if the action that you have specified is allowed on the specified Securonix SNYPR incident based on the incident ID and action name you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incidentId
parameters.tooltip: ID of the incident whose associated tasks and actions you want to retrieve from Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: ID of the incident whose associated tasks and actions you want to retrieve from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Action Name
parameters.name: actionName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the action that you want to execute on the specific Securonix SNYPR incident.
parameters.description: Name of the action that you want to execute on the specific Securonix SNYPR incident.

operations.title: Get Available Threat Action
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all available threat actions from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Get Incident Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific incident from Securonix SNYPR based on the incident ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incidentId
parameters.description: ID of the incident whose details you want to retrieve from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Get Incident Status
operations.description: Retrieves the status of a specific incident from Securonix SNYPR based on the incident ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incidentId
parameters.tooltip: ID of the incident whose status you want to retrieve from Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: ID of the incident whose status you want to retrieve from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Get Incident Workflow
operations.description: Retrieves the workflow of a specific incident from Securonix SNYPR based on the incident ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incidentId
parameters.tooltip: ID of the incident whose workflow you want to retrieve from Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: ID of the incident whose workflow you want to retrieve from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Get Possible Actions for Incident
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all possible actions associated with a specific incident from Securonix SNYPR based on the incident ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incidentId
parameters.tooltip: ID of the incident whose related actions you want to retrieve from Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: ID of the incident whose related actions you want to retrieve from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Get Risk Score
operations.description: Retrieves risk scores for all users or risk scores from Securonix SNYPRbased on the query attributes and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query attributes based on which you want to retrieve the risk score from Securonix SNYPR. Note: If you do not specify any query attribute, then the risk scores of all users is retrieved from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: from
parameters.tooltip: If you select Custom Range option for the Time Range parameter then specify the DateTime from when you want to retrieve records from Securonix SNYPR, Default to last calendar month.
parameters.description: Start date and time from when you want to retrieve the risk score from Securonix SNYPR.If you click custom expression ({}), then you must add a custom jinja expressions for the start date and time from when you want to retrieve the risk score from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: to
parameters.tooltip: If you select Custom Range option for the Time Range parameter then specify the DateTime from when you want to retrieve records from Securonix SNYPR, Default to today.
parameters.description: End date and time till when you want to retrieve the risk score from Securonix SNYPR. If you click custom expression ({}), then you must add a custom jinja expressions for the end date and time till when you want to retrieve the risk score from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Get Risk History
operations.description: Retrieves risk history for all users or risk history from Securonix SNYPR based on the query attributes and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query attributes based on which you want to retrieve the risk history from Securonix SNYPR. Note: If you do not specify any query attribute, then the risk history of all users is retrieved from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: from
parameters.tooltip: If you select Custom Range option for the Time Range parameter then specify the DateTime from when you want to retrieve records from Securonix SNYPR, Default to last calendar month.
parameters.description: Start date and time from when you want to retrieve details of violations from Securonix SNYPR. If you click custom expression ({}), then you must add a custom jinja expressions for the start date and time from when you want to retrieve the risk history from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: to
parameters.tooltip: If you select Custom Range option for the Time Range parameter then specify the DateTime from when you want to retrieve records from Securonix SNYPR, Default to today
parameters.description: End date and time till when you want to retrieve details of violations from Securonix SNYPR. If you click custom expression ({}), then you must add a custom jinja expressions for the end date and time till when you want to retrieve the risk history from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Get Top Threats
operations.description: Retrieves the top threats from Securonix SNYPR based on when the threat was last seen and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Last Seen
parameters.name: dateunit
parameters.tooltip: select time period one of the following
parameters.description: Time period for which you want to retrieve the top threats from Securonix SNYPR. You can choose one of the following: Hours, Days, or Years.Based on the option that you select in the Last Seen drop-down list, you must specify the value for the Hours, Days, or Years. For example, if you select Hours from the Last Seen drop-down list, then you must choose the value of the hours from the Last Hours drop-down list, for example, Last 24 hours, Last 1 hour etc.

operations.title: Get Top Violations
operations.description: Retrieves the top violations from Securonix SNYPR based on when the violation was last seen and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Last Seen
parameters.name: dateunit
parameters.tooltip: select time period one of the following
parameters.description: Time period for which you want to retrieve the top violations from Securonix SNYPR. You can choose one of the following: Hours, Days, or Years. Based on the option that you select in the Last Seen drop-down list, you must specify the value for the Hours, Days, or Years. For example, if you select Hours from the Last Seen drop-down list, then you must choose the value of the hours from the Last Hours drop-down list, for example, Last 24 hours, Last 1 hour, etc.

operations.title: Get Top Violators
operations.description: Retrieves the top violators from Securonix SNYPR based on when the violator was last seen and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Last Seen
parameters.name: dateunit
parameters.description: Time period for which you want to retrieve the top violators from Securonix SNYPR. You can choose one of the following: Hours, Days, or Years. Based on the option that you select in the Last Seen drop-down list, you must specify the value for the Hours, Days, or Years. For example, if you select Hours from the Last Seen drop-down list, then you must choose the value of the hours from the Last Hours drop-down list, for example, Last 24 hours, Last 1 hour, etc.
parameters.tooltip: select time period one of the following

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: 0 based index of the page that this operation should return.
parameters.tooltip: 0 based index of the page that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.

operations.title: Get Workflows
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all existing workflows from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Get Workflow Default Assignee
operations.description: Retrieves the default assignee details for a specified workflow from Securonix SNYPR based on the workflow name you have specified.

parameters.title: Workflow Name
parameters.name: workflow
parameters.tooltip: Provide name of the workflow you want to retrieve default assignee from Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: Provide name of the workflow you want to retrieve default assignee from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: List Incidents
operations.description: Retrieves a list of incidents from the Securonix SNYPR platform based on the range type, date range, and other filter parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Range Type
parameters.name: rangeType
parameters.tooltip: Type of filter based on which you want to retrieve the list of incidents from Securonix SNYPR. You can choose from the following options: Opened, Updated, or Closed.
parameters.description: Type of filter based on which you want to retrieve the list of incidents from Securonix SNYPR. You can choose from the following options: Opened, Updated, or Closed.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: from
parameters.tooltip: DateTime from when you want to retrieve the list of incidents from Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: DateTime from when you want to retrieve the list of incidents from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: to
parameters.tooltip: DateTime till when you want to retrieve the list of incidents from Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: DateTime till when you want to retrieve the list of incidents from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: (Optional) CSV list of status values based on which you want to filter the list of incidents retrieved from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: (Optional) 0-based index of the page that this operation should return.
parameters.tooltip: 0 based index of the page that this operation should return.

operations.title: List All Peer Groups
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all peer groups from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: List All Policies
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all policies from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: List All Resource Groups
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all resource groups from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: List All Users
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all users from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Custom Query
operations.description: Runs a search on Securonix SNYPR and retrieves details based on the query attributes and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query attributes based on which you want to run the search on Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Event Start Time
parameters.name: eventtime_from
parameters.tooltip: If you select Custom Range option for the Time Range parameter then specify the DateTime from when you want to retrieve records from Securonix SNYPR, Default to last calendar month.
parameters.description: Start date and time from when you want to run the search on Securonix SNYPR. If you click custom expression ({}), then you must add a custom jinja expressions for the start date and time from when you want to retrieve the risk score from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Event End Time
parameters.name: eventtime_to
parameters.tooltip: If you select Custom Range option for the Time Range parameter then specify the DateTime from when you want to retrieve records from Securonix SNYPR, Default to today.
parameters.description: End date and time till when you want to run the search on Securonix SNYPR. If you click custom expression ({}), then you must add a custom jinja expressions for the end date and time till when you want to retrieve the risk score from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Generation Start Time
parameters.name: generationtime_from
parameters.tooltip: If you select Custom Range option for the Time Range parameter then specify the DateTime from when you want to retrieve records from Securonix SNYPR, Default to last calendar month.
parameters.description: Start date and time from when you want to run the search on Securonix SNYPR. If you click custom expression ({}), then you must add a custom jinja expressions for the start date and time from when you want to retrieve the risk score from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Generation End Time
parameters.name: generationtime_to
parameters.tooltip: If you select Custom Range option for the Time Range parameter then specify the DateTime from when you want to retrieve records from Securonix SNYPR, Default to today.
parameters.description: End date and time till when you want to run the search on Securonix SNYPR.If you click custom expression ({}), then you must add a custom jinja expressions for the end date and time till when you want to retrieve the risk score from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Query Third Party Intelligence
operations.description: Retrieves details of all TPIs or specific TPIs from Securonix SNYPR based on the query attributes that you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.description: (Optional) Query attributes based on which you want to retrieve details of TPIs from Securonix SNYPR. Note: If you do not specify any query attribute, then the details of all TPIs are retrieved from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Query Violations
operations.description: Retrieves details of all violations or specific violations from Securonix SNYPR based on the query attributes and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query attributes based on which you want to retrieve details of violations from Securonix SNYPR. Note: If you do not specify any query attribute, then the details of all violations are retrieved from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Generation Start Time
parameters.name: generationtime_from
parameters.tooltip: If you select Custom Range option for the Time Range parameter then specify the DateTime from when you want to retrieve records from Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: Start date and time from when you want to retrieve details of violations from Securonix SNYPR. If you click custom expression ({}), then you must add a custom jinja expressions for the start date and time from when you want to retrieve details of violations from Securonix SNYPR.

parameters.title: Generation End Time
parameters.name: generationtime_to
parameters.tooltip: If you select Custom Range option for the Time Range parameter then specify the DateTime from when you want to retrieve records from Securonix SNYPR.
parameters.description: End date and time till when you want to retrieve details of violations from Securonix SNYPR. If you click custom expression ({}), then you must add a custom jinja expressions for the end date and time till when you want to retrieve details of violations from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Query Users
operations.description: Retrieves details of all users or specific users from Securonix SNYPR based on the query attributes that you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.description: (Optional) Query attributes based on which you want to retrieve details of users from Securonix SNYPR. Note: If you do not specify any query attribute, then the details of all users are retrieved from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Query Watchlist
operations.description: Retrieves details of all watchlists or specific watchlists from Securonix SNYPR based on the query attributes that you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.description: (Optional) Query attributes based on which you want to retrieve details of watchlists from Securonix SNYPR. Note: If you do not specify any query attribute, then the details of all watchlists are retrieved from Securonix SNYPR.

operations.title: Task action on incident
operations.description: Takes a specified action on a Securonix SNYPR incident based on the incident ID, action, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incidentId
parameters.description: ID of the incident in Securonix SNYPR on which you want to take the specified action.

parameters.title: Action Name
parameters.name: actionName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the action that you want to take on the specified Securonix SNYPR incident.
parameters.description: Name of the action that you want to take on the specified Securonix SNYPR incident.

parameters.title: Other Required Fields
parameters.name: other_fields
parameters.tooltip: Additional required fields, in the JSON format, which you want to add to your request.
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional required fields, in the JSON format, which you want to add to your request.
